name: Hoang Anh Cau Giay 3 Hotel
address: G1, Area 4, Mai Dich Ward, Cau Giay District, My Dinh National Stadium, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in My Dinh National Stadium, Hoang Anh Cau Giay 3 Hotel is the perfect place to experience Hanoi and its surroundings. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

At Hoang Anh Cau Giay 3 Hotel, every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. To name a few of the hotel's facilities, there are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, room service, airport transfer, car hire, elevator.

Experience high quality room facilities during your stay here. Some rooms include mirror, towels, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), desk, provided to help guests recharge after a long day. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Whatever your purpose of visit, Hoang Anh Cau Giay 3 Hotel is an excellent choice for your stay in Hanoi.
